{
  "startDateTime": "{{startDateTime1}}",
  "endDateTime": "{{endDateTime1}}",
  "totalCost": 330,
  "location": {
    "pickupLocation": "789 Cross Rd",
    "dropoffLocation": "101 Park Blvd"
  },
  "guardian": "{{guardianId1}}",
  "babysitter": "{{babysitterId1}}",
  "children": [
    "{{childId3}}"
  ],
  "status": "Confirmed",
   "description": "Morning session for Peter.",

}
